Operation.Name: CaptureBitmap
Operation.Description: Saves a screen capture of the object as a .png or .bmp image using the specified file name.

Operation.Name: CheckProperty
Operation.Description: Checks whether the actual value of the specified object property achieves the specified expected value within the specified timeout.

Operation.Name: ChildObjects
Operation.Description: Returns the collection of child objects contained within the object.

Operation.Name: GetROProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the current value of the test object property from the object in the application.

Operation.Name: GetTOProperties
Operation.Description: Returns the collection of properties and values used to identify the object.

Operation.Name: GetTOProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the value of the specified property from the test object description.

Operation.Name: SetTOProperty
Operation.Description: Sets the value of the specified property in the test object description.

Operation.Name: ToString
Operation.Description: Returns a string that represents the current test object.

Operation.Name: WaitProperty
Operation.Description: Waits until the specified object property achieves the specified value or exceeds the specified timeout before continuing to the next step.

Operation.Name: Exist
Operation.Description: Checks whether the object currently exists in the open application.

Operation.Name: GetTextLocation
Operation.Description: Checks whether the specified text string is contained in the specified window area.

Operation.Name: Click
Operation.Description: Clicks an object.

Operation.Name: DblClick
Operation.Description: Double-clicks an object.

Operation.Name: Drag
Operation.Description: Performs the 'drag' part of a drag and drop operation.

Operation.Name: Drop
Operation.Description: Performs the 'drop' part of a drag and drop operation.

Operation.Name: GetVisibleText
Operation.Description: Returns the text from the specified area.

Operation.Name: MouseMove
Operation.Description: Moves the mouse pointer to the designated position inside the object.

Operation.Name: Type
Operation.Description: Types the specified string in the object.

Operation.Name: SetROProperty
Operation.Description: Sets the value of the specified property of the object in the application.
Operation.Documentation: Set the value of the %l %t's %a1 property to %a2 in the application.

ClassInfo.Name: DelphiStatic
ClassInfo.Description: A Delphi Static control, such as an image or label.

Operation.Name: Activate
Operation.Description: Activates (double-clicks) the specified item in the list.

Operation.Name: CheckItemProperty
Operation.Description: Checks whether the specified item property achieves the specified value within the specified timeout.

Operation.Name: Deselect
Operation.Description: Deselects an item in the list.

Operation.Name: ExtendSelect
Operation.Description: Selects an additional item from the multi-selection list.

Operation.Name: GetContent
Operation.Description: Returns all of the items in the list.

Operation.Name: GetItem
Operation.Description: Returns the value of the item specified by the index.

Operation.Name: GetItemProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the current value of a property for an item in the list.

Operation.Name: GetItemsCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of items in the list.

Operation.Name: GetSelection
Operation.Description: Returns all of the selected items in the list.

Operation.Name: Select
Operation.Description: Selects an item from the list.

Operation.Name: SelectRange
Operation.Description: Selects all list items between (and including) the two specified items.

Operation.Name: WaitItemProperty
Operation.Description: Waits until the specified item property achieves the specified value or exceeds the specified timeout before continuing to the next step.

Operation.Name: NextLine
Operation.Description: Moves the scroll bar downward, or to the right, the specified number of lines.

Operation.Name: NextPage
Operation.Description: Moves the scroll bar downward, or to the right, the specified number of pages.

Operation.Name: PrevLine
Operation.Description: Moves the scroll bar upward, or to the left, the specified number of lines.

Operation.Name: PrevPage
Operation.Description: Moves the scroll bar upward, or to the left, the specified number of pages.

Operation.Name: Set
Operation.Description: Sets the scroll bar position.

Operation.Name: CheckItemProperty
Operation.Description: Checks whether the specified item property achieves the specified value within the specified timeout.

Operation.Name: GetContent
Operation.Description: Returns a string representation of all the items (parts) in the status bar.

Operation.Name: GetItem
Operation.Description: Returns the name of the specified status bar item.

Operation.Name: GetItemProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the current value of a property for an item (part) in the status bar.

Operation.Name: GetItemsCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of items in the status bar.

Operation.Name: WaitItemProperty
Operation.Description: Waits until the specified item property achieves the specified value or exceeds the specified timeout before continuing to the next step.

Operation.Name: Next
Operation.Description: Sets the spin object to its next value.

Operation.Name: Prev
Operation.Description: Sets the spin object to its previous value.

Operation.Name: Set
Operation.Description: Sets the spin object to the specified value.

Operation.Name: Set
Operation.Description: Sets the radio button as the selected radio button.

Operation.Name: Set
Operation.Description: Sets the value of the check box.

ClassInfo.Name: DelphiTabStrip
ClassInfo.Description: A Delphi tab strip in a dialog box.

Operation.Name: GetSelection
Operation.Description: Returns the selected tab in the tab strip.

Operation.Name: Select
Operation.Description: Selects the specified tab item.

Operation.Name: CheckItemProperty
Operation.Description: Checks whether the specified item property achieves the specified value within the specified timeout.

Operation.Name: GetContent
Operation.Description: Returns a list of all of the tabs in the tab strip.

Operation.Name: GetItem
Operation.Description: Returns the value of the tab specified by the index.

Operation.Name: GetItemProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the current value of a property for a tab item in the tab strip.

Operation.Name: GetItemsCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of tabs in the tab strip.

Operation.Name: WaitItemProperty
Operation.Description: Waits until the specified item property achieves the specified value or exceeds the specified timeout before continuing to the next step.

Operation.Name: HScroll
Operation.Description: Horizontally scrolls an object that has embedded scrollbars.

Operation.Name: VScroll
Operation.Description: Vertically scrolls an object that has embedded scrollbars.

ClassInfo.Name: DelphiWindow
ClassInfo.Description: A Delphi window or dialog box.

Operation.Name: Activate
Operation.Description: Activates the window or dialog box.

Operation.Name: Close
Operation.Description: Closes the window or dialog box.

Operation.Name: Maximize
Operation.Description: Maximizes the window or dialog box to fill the entire screen.

Operation.Name: Minimize
Operation.Description: Minimizes the window or dialog box to an icon.

Operation.Name: Move
Operation.Description: Moves the window or dialog box to the specified absolute location on the screen.

Operation.Name: Resize
Operation.Description: Resizes the window or dialog box to the specified dimensions.

Operation.Name: Restore
Operation.Description: Restores the window or dialog box to its previous size.

Operation.Name: GetContent
Operation.Description: Returns a string containing the names of all of the items in the combo box.

Operation.Name: GetItem
Operation.Description: Returns the value of the item specified by the index.

Operation.Name: GetItemsCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of items in the combo box.

Operation.Name: GetSelection
Operation.Description: Returns the selected item in the combo box.

Operation.Name: Select
Operation.Description: Selects an item from the combo box.

Operation.Name: SetCaretPos
Operation.Description: Places the cursor at the specified point in the edit box.

Operation.Name: SetSelection
Operation.Description: Selects text in the edit box.

Operation.Name: Set
Operation.Description: Sets the value of the edit box.

Operation.Name: SetSecure
Operation.Description: Sets the encrypted value of the edit box.

Operation.Name: SetCaretPos
Operation.Description: Places the cursor at the specified point in the multi-line editor.

Operation.Name: SetSelection
Operation.Description: Selects text in the multi-line editor.

Operation.Name: Activate
Operation.Description: Activates (double-clicks) the specified item in the object's list.

Operation.Name: CheckItemProperty
Operation.Description: Checks whether the specified item property achieves the specified value within the specified timeout.

Operation.Name: Deselect
Operation.Description: Deselects an item in the list.

Operation.Name: ExtendSelect
Operation.Description: Selects an additional item from the multi-selection list.

Operation.Name: GetContent
Operation.Description: Returns all of the items in the list.

Operation.Name: GetItem
Operation.Description: Returns the value of the item specified by the index.

Operation.Name: GetItemProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the current value of the specified property for the specified item in the list.

Operation.Name: GetItemsCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of items in the list.

Operation.Name: GetSelection
Operation.Description: Returns all of the selected items in the list.

Operation.Name: Select
Operation.Description: Selects an item from the list.

Operation.Name: SelectRange
Operation.Description: Selects all list items between (and including) the two specified items.

Operation.Name: WaitItemProperty
Operation.Description: Waits until the specified item property achieves the specified value or exceeds the specified timeout before continuing to the next step.

Operation.Name: ColumnCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of columns in the (report-style) list-view object.

Operation.Name: DragItem
Operation.Description: Performs the 'drag' part of a drag and drop operation.

Operation.Name: DropOnItem
Operation.Description: Performs the 'drop' part of a drag and drop operation.

Operation.Name: EditLabel
Operation.Description: Activates the edit mode for the list's label to enable renaming.

Operation.Name: GetCheckMarks
Operation.Description: Retrieves the number and the value of items marked as checked.

Operation.Name: GetColumnHeader
Operation.Description: Returns the text header of the specified (report-style) list-view column.

Operation.Name: GetSubItem
Operation.Description: Returns the text value of the (report-style) list-view subitem.

Operation.Name: SetItemState
Operation.Description: Sets the state of the check box icon of the specified item in the list.

Operation.Name: GetSelection
Operation.Description: Returns all of the selected nodes in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: Select
Operation.Description: Selects a node in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: CheckItemProperty
Operation.Description: Checks whether the specified item property achieves the specified value within the specified timeout.

Operation.Name: GetContent
Operation.Description: Returns all of the nodes in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: GetItem
Operation.Description: Returns the value of the node specified by the index.

Operation.Name: GetItemProperty
Operation.Description: Returns the current value of a property for a node in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: GetItemsCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of nodes in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: WaitItemProperty
Operation.Description: Waits until the specified item property achieves the specified value or exceeds the specified timeout before continuing to the next step.

Operation.Name: Activate
Operation.Description: Activates (double-clicks) a node in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: Collapse
Operation.Description: Hides sub-nodes of the specified node in the expanded tree-view control.

Operation.Name: DragItem
Operation.Description: Performs the 'drag' part of a drag and drop operation.

Operation.Name: DropOnItem
Operation.Description: Performs the 'drop' part of a drag and drop operation.

Operation.Name: EditLabel
Operation.Description: Activates the edit mode for a node in the tree-view control to enable renaming.

Operation.Name: Expand
Operation.Description: Displays hidden sub-nodes of the specified node in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: ExpandAll
Operation.Description: Expands the node in the tree-view control and all of the nodes below it.

Operation.Name: GetCheckMarks
Operation.Description: Retrieves the index value for each node marked as checked.

Operation.Name: SetItemState
Operation.Description: Sets the state of the check box icon of the specified node in the tree-view control.

Operation.Name: SelectCell
Operation.Description: Selects (clicks) the specified cell in the table.

Operation.Name: ActivateCell
Operation.Description: Activates (double-clicks) the specified cell in the table.

Operation.Name: SelectRow
Operation.Description: Selects (clicks) the specified row in the table.

Operation.Name: ActivateRow
Operation.Description: Activates (double-clicks) the specified row in the table.

Operation.Name: ActivateColumn
Operation.Description: Activates (double-clicks) the specified column in the table.

Operation.Name: SelectColumn
Operation.Description: Selects (clicks) the specified column in the table.

Operation.Name: SetCellData
Operation.Description: Sets the contents of a cell to the specified text.

Operation.Name: GetCellData
Operation.Description: Retrieves the contents of the specified cell from the table.

Operation.Name: MakeCellVisible
Operation.Description: Scrolls the specified cell into view if it is not visible in the table.

Operation.Name: ColumnCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of columns in the table.

Operation.Name: RowCount
Operation.Description: Returns the number of rows in the table.

Operation.Name: ClickFirst
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'First' navigator button and selects the first record in the database.
Operation.Documentation: Click the First button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickPrior
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Prior' navigator button and selects the previous record in the database.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Prior button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickNext
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Next' navigator button and selects the next record in the database.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Next button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickLast
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Last' navigator button and selects the last record in the database.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Last button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickInsert
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Insert' navigator button and inserts a record in the database before the current record.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Insert button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickDelete
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Delete' navigator button and deletes the current record.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Delete button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickEdit
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Edit' navigator button and enables the current record for editing.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Edit button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickPost
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Post' navigator button and saves all changes to the database.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Post button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickCancel
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Cancel' navigator button and reverts to the previously saved data.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Cancel button in the %l %t.

Operation.Name: ClickRefresh
Operation.Description: Clicks the 'Refresh' navigator button and refreshes the displayed data.
Operation.Documentation: Click the Refresh button in the %l %t.
